text:
R. Thirugnanam assumed office as the Commissioner of Police, Tirunelveli City, on Monday.

A Group I Officer of Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission, Mr. Thirugnanam was promoted in 1996 and posted as Superintendent of Police, Thanjavur.

On being promoted as DIG, he served in Kancheepuram range and then served as IG – Headquarters before being posted as Commissioner of Police, Tirunelveli City.
title: New Police Commissioner assumes office
